description:
This lightweight avalanche rescue shovel has a hardened, anodized aluminum blade with a sharpened edge to cut through avalanche debris. A large blade, extended length and ergonomic shaft and handle ensure efficient movement of snow, a critical factor in companion rescue. The straight-backed blade is ideal for cutting clean snow profiles, and features plenty of attachment holes for building a snow anchor or rescue sled.

  • Hardened, anodized aluminum shovel blade
  • Oval telescopic shaft for easy extension and ergonomic grip
  • Automatic zipper locking for quick, precise guidance during assembly
  • Ergonomically shaped T-grip for efficient transfer of strength
  • Space-saving blade design
  • Sharpened, tilt-resistant blade with integrated steps
  • Straight blade is perfect for cutting clean snow profiles
  • Attachment holes for snow anchor and rescue sled
name: Mammut Alugator Pro Light Shovel
